    • readFile

      public static void readFile(ArrayList<Account> accounts) throws IOException
      Read from file (account.txt) line by line. Create account class for each player. Set the player's username and high score.
      Parameters:
      accounts - arraylist from Account class
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile(String text) throws IOException
      Write the file (account.txt) on new line. Append new player's username and high score in file.
      Parameters:
      text - text to be added in file
      Throws:
      IOException
